app.title: tiStudent App
general.error: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
authorization.error: You are not authorized to view this page. Please login first.

home.message: tiStudent is a platform where you can share academic resources. As a user you can upload resources of your own, and like and comment on resources from other people. You can view your liked resources and get an overview of all the resources you have shared.

error.title: Title is required
error.title.length: title cannot be longer than 60 characters
error.description.length: Description cannot be longer than 500 characters
error.subject: Subject is required

error.bio: Bio can't be longer than 200 characters

password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.number: Password must contain at least 1 number
password.capital: Password must contain at least 1 capital letter
password.special: Password must contain at least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{};':"|,.<>/?)
